markdown: {{DisambigMsg|the quest|the enchantment|Hidden Depths (enchantment)}} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTheForgottenSanctum/) in {{lax3}}. ## Synopsis The archmage [Llengrath](/llengrath/) paid me a visit on my ship and warned me of possible impending doom in the Black Isles. She requested my aid in her search for the archmage Maura, who has been seeking a way to stop Eothas. ## Walkthrough * This is the introductory quest to {{lax3}}, leading you to the [Temple of Revelation](/templeOfRevelation/). * First, head to [The Black Isles](/theBlackIsles/), a large volcanic island south of [Tikawara](/tikawara/). Disembark at the southwestern-most point, and walk to the center of the island to reveal the entrance to the [Hall of the Unseen](/hallOfTheUnseen/). * The Hall of the Unseen is a large maze of switches and doors. Thankfully starting this quest means that all the doors will open upon entering, preventing the need to complete the puzzle that would otherwise be required to reach the center. * Once you reach the center, [Llengrath](/llengrath/) will greet you and open the staircase down (located in the western wall of the central area, and to the north of the unlocked chest). This completes the quest ## Bugs * A bug may be encountered which causes Llengrath to not spawn upon reaching the center. This means you can't talk to her, which will prevent the staircase from appearing. * To show Llengrath and re-trigger the cutscene, use the following [console](/console/) commands (these require cheats to be enabled). This will also complete the quest: :: [ActivateObject](/consoleActivateObject/) 8ba5594c-b894-40b0-b9c6-22a439538431 True :: [StartCutscene](/consoleStartCutscene/) 8ba5594c-0a8d-4ac7-befa-ff1644aa8320 * The staircase may be manually activated using the command: :: [ActivateObject](/consoleActivateObject/) 8ba5594c-5dec-46b4-976e-893a52b47b8b True. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/LAX03_Forgotten_Sanctum/lax03_cp_qst_01.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Hidden Depths''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The archmage Llengrath paid me a visit on my ship and warned me of possible impending doom in the Black Isles. She requested my aid in her search for the archmage Maura, who has been seeking a way to stop Eothas. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak with Llengrath inside the Hall of the Unseen.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Llengrath awaits me in the Hall of the Unseen, a ruin buried on the Black Isles, which lie directly south of Tikawara. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''10''' | colspan="2" | '''Follow Llengrath.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10010 | Llengrath has descended into a newly-opened chamber beneath the Hall of the Unseen. She requested that I accompany her. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I joined Llengrath within the Temple of Revelation. |}
